Aug. 29, 1953 D Amble Contest

amble-contest

Welfare Park, Amble, Northumberland, England, UK 6 bands entered, 5 competed
March contest 1st Crookhall, 2nd North Seaton. Hymn tune 1st Crookhall, 2nd Blackhall, 3rd Bedlington. Best cornet, euphonium, trombone and soprano - North Seaton. Best Basses, bass trombone and flugal - Crookhall. Prizes - 1st |£30 and cup, 2nd £14, 3rd £7.
